option.name: originalContent
option.value:
VANTA #31000
  • About
  • Team
  • Resources
  • Sponsors
  • Contact
☰

Engineering the Unknown

VANTA
ROBOTICS

Discover More
↓

WHO WE ARE

Based in the vibrant tech hub of Orlando, Florida, Vanta Robotics is a dedicated FIRST Tech Challenge team fueled by a passion for innovation and problem-solving.

We are a collective of students, mentors, and community members committed to pushing the boundaries of technology through collaboration, creativity, and competition. Our mission is to inspire the next generation of STEM leaders while building advanced, competitive robots.

20+

Years FTC Experience

15+

Years FRC Experience

11

Passionate Members

MEET THE TEAM

Team Members

Ismail Akdeniz

Mechanical Design & 3D Printing
Ismail translates complex digital concepts into tangible reality, specializing in rapid prototyping and manufacturing with our in-house 3D printing capabilities.

Arav Sonawane

CAD & System Architecture
As a lead designer, Arav architects the robot's core structure in CAD, ensuring every component integrates flawlessly for peak performance and reliability.

Monish Saravana

Software Development & Digital Outreach
Monish spearheads our software strategy, developing advanced control systems and computer vision, while also creating digital tools to empower the wider FTC community.

Shiva Patel

Brand Architect & Digital Engagement
Shiva is the architect of our public identity, igniting community hype and forging the strategic brand partnerships that will make Vanta Robotics a globally recognized name.

Josef Junga

Game Strategy & Integration
Josef is our strategic mind, analyzing the game to devise winning tactics and ensuring our robot's design directly serves our competitive goals.

Shrey Trivedi

Drive Team & Performance Tuning
With ice in his veins, Shrey pilots the robot during competition, translating strategy into action and providing critical feedback for performance tuning.

Armando Collazo

CNC Fabrication & Machining
Armando brings precision engineering to the team, utilizing CNC fabrication to create custom-machined parts that offer unparalleled strength and accuracy.

Eydan Collazo

Mechanical Assembly & Prototyping
Eydan is a versatile builder, rapidly iterating on mechanical prototypes and meticulously assembling the final robot with a keen eye for detail and durability.

Anum Ali

Social & Meida
Anum manages the robot's nervous system, meticulously wiring the electronics and optimizing power distribution to ensure flawless operation under pressure.

Daniyal Siddiquie

Hardware & Software Integration
Daniyal serves as the crucial link between our code and our physical machine, ensuring that software commands translate perfectly into mechanical action.

Coaches & Mentors

Dmitri Morales

Head Coach & Mentor - Disney Software Engineer
As Head Coach, Dmitri channels his experience as a Disney Software Engineer and Duke Bioengineering graduate to architect our technical strategy and push the boundaries of what's possible in FTC.

Tom Wilk Jr.

Mentor - Walt Disney Imagineering
Tom brings the magic of Walt Disney Imagineering to our workshop, providing unparalleled insight into professional robotics and animatronics to help us engineer truly innovative mechanical systems.

Eleni Morales

Mentor - MIT BattleBots
Bringing a battle-hardened perspective from the legendary MIT BattleBots team, Eleni mentors our design process with a focus on durability, rapid prototyping, and the creative problem-solving required to win.

Irian De Jesus

Coach
Irian provides essential guidance and project management, keeping the team focused, organized, and prepared for the logistical challenges of a competitive season.

Tristan Junga

Coach & Alumni Advisor
Leveraging his extensive FIRST experience and studies at the University of Florida, Tristan offers invaluable technical advice and strategic insight to the team.

RESOURCES

Secrets — Advanced Analytics

secrets.team31000.org: match predictions, time-series tracking, event-wide insights, media mentions, and custom metrics to power scouting and strategy.

Explore Secrets

Coach — Portfolio & Judging Prep

coach.team31000.org: upload your portfolio to get hyper-personalized feedback, award-fit analysis, actionable improvements, and tailored judging interview prep.

Try Coach

BOT INCOMING

00Days
00Hours
00Minutes
00Seconds

Get Ready for Eclipse

MISSION PARTNERS

Our journey is made possible by the generous support of our sponsors.

→

See all sponsors

© 2025-2026 Vanta Robotics - FTC Team #31000. All Rights Reserved.

RESOURCES

Tools & Media from Vanta

We build tools and media to help FTC teams scout smarter, prepare for judging, and learn—explore our analytics, portfolio coach, and extensive video collection below.

Secrets — Advanced Analytics

secrets.team31000.org — match predictions, time-series tracking, event-wide insights, media mentions, and custom metrics to power scouting and strategy.

Explore Secrets Learn more

Coach — Portfolio & Judging Prep

coach.team31000.org — upload your portfolio for hyper-personalized feedback, award-fit analysis, concrete action items, and interview prep tailored to your team.

Try Coach See features

Blogs — Vlogs & How-tos

blogs.team31000.org — a huge collection of vlogs and tutorials covering design, programming, scouting, strategy, outreach, and more. Learn from our demos and team insights.

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
VANTA #31000
  • About
  • Team
  • Resources
  • Sponsors
  • Contact
☰

RESOURCES

Tools by Vanta Robotics

We build tools to help FTC teams scout smarter and prepare for judging: Secrets (advanced analytics) and Coach (portfolio & judging prep). Click a tool below for details and demos.

FTC SECRETS — secrets.team31000.org

The most advanced analytics platform for FTC ever built. Secrets provides comprehensive, event-aware analytics and brand-new metrics to help teams plan strategy, scout smarter, and track progress over time.

  • Tracking over time: view team performance trends across matches, events, and seasons.
  • Match predictions: data-driven outcome forecasts to inform alliance selection and match strategy.
  • Event-wide analytics: heatmaps, meta-analysis, and event summaries that reveal high-level trends.
  • Media integration: detect and graph team mentions in YouTube and other media over time.
  • Custom comparisons: head-to-head or cohort comparisons across any metric.
Visit secrets.team31000.org See a demo

FTC COACH — coach.team31000.org

Portfolio analysis and judging prep reimagined. Upload your engineering portfolio and receive hyper-personalized, actionable feedback tailored to your team.

  • Portfolio critique: specific wording edits, design consistency improvements, and alignment with judging criteria.
  • Award-fit analysis: tells you which awards you're most competitive for and how to optimize for them.
  • Actionable tasks: prioritized steps your team can take to improve presentation and portfolio quality.
  • Judging prep: tailored interview questions based on your portfolio, model answers, key talking points, and award-tagged filters.
  • Trusted sources: trained on official rubrics, winning portfolios, and expert advice for practical, results-driven recommendations.
Try FTC COACH How it works

FTC COACH (Judging Tools)

Judging prep that actually maps to your portfolio — practice the exact questions judges are likely to ask and learn concise, award-focused answers.

Judging prep

Tools by Vanta Robotics

We build tools to help FTC teams scout smarter and prepare for judging: Secrets (advanced analytics), Coach (portfolio & judging prep), and Blogs (vlogs & tutorials). Click a tool below for details, features, and demos.

FTC SECRETS — secrets.team31000.org

The most advanced analytics platform for FTC ever built. Secrets provides comprehensive, event-aware analytics and brand-new metrics to help teams plan strategy, scout smarter, and track progress over time.

  • Tracking over time: view team performance trends across matches, events, and seasons.
  • Match predictions: data-driven outcome forecasts to inform alliance selection and match strategy.
  • Event-wide analytics: heatmaps, meta-analysis, and event summaries that reveal high-level trends.
  • Media integration: detect and graph team mentions in YouTube and other media over time.
  • Custom comparisons: head-to-head or cohort comparisons across any metric.
Visit secrets.team31000.org See a demo

FTC COACH — coach.team31000.org

Portfolio analysis and judging prep reimagined. Upload your engineering portfolio and receive hyper-personalized, actionable feedback tailored to your team.

  • Portfolio critique: specific wording edits, design consistency improvements, and alignment with judging criteria.
  • Award-fit analysis: tells you which awards you're most competitive for and how to optimize for them.
  • Actionable tasks: prioritized steps your team can take to improve presentation and portfolio quality.
  • Judging prep: tailored interview questions based on your portfolio, model answers, key talking points, and award-tagged filters.
  • Trusted sources: trained on official rubrics, winning portfolios, and expert advice for practical, results-driven recommendations.
Try FTC COACH How it works

BLOGS & VLOGS — blogs.team31000.org

Our video library and blog collection. Hundreds of vlogs covering design, programming, strategy, outreach, judging tips, and step-by-step tutorials—perfect for teams looking to learn quickly from our experiences.

  • Comprehensive topics: hardware, software, scouting, strategy, outreach, awards, and outreach case studies.
  • Searchable library: find videos and posts by topic, skill level, or season.
  • Community-driven: curated playlists and featured series from Vanta Robotics members and mentors.
Visit blogs.team31000.org Browse videos

Judging Tools

Judging prep that actually maps to your portfolio — practice the exact questions judges are likely to ask and learn concise, award-focused answers. Available through Coach.

Judging prep
